content: > **black friday sale 30% discount at checkout until 2nd december** free pattern available on my blog with ads for both ** straight needles 1 ** seamed down the back and ** knit in the round 2 ** with a circular needle or dpns **premium pattern ebook** for sale on ravelry includes * patterns for 2 outfits this dress and a summer outfit crop top and mini skirt * full pdf pattern with photos 11 pages * short text only pdf pattern for easy printing 3 pages * patterns for both straight + circular needles * priority pattern support > **get 25% off when you buy any 2 pattern products** no coupon needed > or ** join my mailing list 3 for 20% > off** all patterns use up leftover **sport or 4ply** yarn knitting this pretty doll s dress for **11 5 inch dolls** including barbie you only need about **35m / 38 yds / 10g of the main colour** & scraps of a contrast colour to do 2 row stockinette for the belt optional for the straight needles version use the cable cast on for a tighter neckline or the knitted cast on for a looser neck that can also be worn off the shoulder links to video demos in pattern 1 https //www craftfix com/barbie-dress-knitting-pattern/ 2 https //www craftfix com/barbie-dress-knitting-pattern-circular/ 3 https //www craftfix com/newsletter
